body_html:
@mrry Oh, I see. Didn't notice the link on common problems, my bad. That'll do :)
…
On Mon, Oct 2, 2017, 2:39 AM Derek Murray ***@***.***> wrote: @Carmezim <https://github.com/carmezim> We already include a link to common installations page (which links to the script) in the error message itself, so I'm not sure people would read it if it were in the issue template :). We're working on better error messages for the Windows build, and hope to have something in 1.4 that should help cut down on these issues! — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#13349 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/APwNCjIDAKXv5EpmvOa_bB3rglGaB3cGks5soD7bgaJpZM4PmTg4> .
body_text:
@mrry Oh, I see. Didn't notice the link on common problems, my bad. That'll do :)
…
On Mon, Oct 2, 2017, 2:39 AM Derek Murray ***@***.***> wrote:
 @Carmezim <https://github.com/carmezim> We already include a link to
 common installations page (which links to the script) in the error message
 itself, so I'm not sure people would read it if it were in the issue
 template :).

 We're working on better error messages for the Windows build, and hope to
 have something in 1.4 that should help cut down on these issues!

 —
 You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
 Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
 <#13349 (comment)>,
 or mute the thread
 <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/APwNCjIDAKXv5EpmvOa_bB3rglGaB3cGks5soD7bgaJpZM4PmTg4>
 .
body:
@mrry Oh, I see. Didn't notice the link on common problems, my bad. That'll do :)

On Mon, Oct 2, 2017, 2:39 AM Derek Murray <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @Carmezim <https://github.com/carmezim> We already include a link to
> common installations page (which links to the script) in the error message
> itself, so I'm not sure people would read it if it were in the issue
> template :).
>
> We're working on better error messages for the Windows build, and hope to
> have something in 1.4 that should help cut down on these issues!
>
> —

> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
